## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G15380](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G15380)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtCTL1, CHER1, CTL1</u>
- **Gene Name:** choline transporter-like 1, choline transporter-like 1, choline transporter-like 1
- **Description:**   Plasma-membrane choline transporter family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090171
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_065853C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced levels of choline and phosphocholine. Impaired in formation of secondary plasmodesmata (PD) and maturation of simple to complex PD.
   - [cher1-5/MP17?GFP]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Dwarf stature,higher than normal accumulation of starches and sugars.Altered lipid profile.
